trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a property across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 定義合約，元件可使用它跨應用程式定義域和處理序界限來存取屬性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract> represents a property of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract>代表實作的遠端物件的屬性<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>介面。

trans-unit.source: To access one or more properties of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取遠端物件的一或多個屬性，請使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>方法來取得<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>表示遠端物件的型別。

trans-unit.source: Then, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 然後，呼叫<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperty%2A>或<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetProperties%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="get" /> accessor of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的 <see langword="get" /> 存取子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the <see langword="get" /> accessor of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies; <see langword="null" /> if the property does not have a <see langword="get" /> accessor.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" />，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的 <see langword="get" /> 存取子，如果屬性沒有 <see langword="null" /> 存取子，則為 <see langword="get" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData" /> that provides information about the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData" />，提供這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData> structure includes the type of the property value and whether the property is readable or writable.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的資訊<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemotePropertyData>結構包含的類型屬性值和屬性是否可讀取或寫入。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see langword="set" /> accessor of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的 <see langword="set" /> 存取子。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the <see langword="set" /> accessor of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies; <see langword="null" /> if the property does not have a <see langword="set" /> accessor.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" />，表示這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的 <see langword="set" /> 存取子，如果屬性沒有 <see langword="null" /> 存取子，則為 <see langword="set" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> that identifies the object that contains the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" />，識別包含屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合，指定叫用屬性的方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; <see langword="null" /> if the property is not indexed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" />，指定索引屬性的索引值，如果未對屬性進行索引，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A locale ID to use for locale-specific conversions that are performed by the property.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定 ID，可用於屬性執行的地區設定特性轉換。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the property value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" />，指定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract.GetValue%2A> implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is write-only.
trans-unit.target: 建議<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract.GetValue%2A>實作擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果屬性是唯寫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" /> that identifies the object that contains the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract" />，識別包含屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the property value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" />，指定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> values that specifies how to invoke the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 值的位元組合，指定叫用屬性的方式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> that specifies the index values for an indexed property; <see langword="null" /> if the property is not indexed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" />，指定索引屬性的索引值，如果未對屬性進行索引，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the property will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定 ID，屬性將使用它來進行任何地區設定特性的型別轉換。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the property that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract" /> 所識別屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract.SetValue%2A> implementations throw an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if the property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 建議<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemotePropertyInfoContract.SetValue%2A>實作擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果屬性是唯讀狀態。
